abstract: Arrow Energy of Australia has opened its books to Royal Dutch Shell and PetroChina so that they conduct due diligence for their joint takeover offer worth at least 3.3 billion Australian dollars ($3.03 billion), Reuters reported.
snippet: Arrow Energy of Australia has opened its books to Royal Dutch Shell and PetroChina so that they conduct due diligence for their joint takeover offer worth at least 3.3 billion Australian dollars ($3.03 billion), Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: Arrow Energy of Australia has opened its books to Royal Dutch Shell and PetroChina so that they conduct due diligence for their joint takeover offer worth at least 3.3 billion Australian dollars ($3.03 billion), Reuters reported, citing sources.

headline.main: Arrow Opens Books to Bidders, Report Says
